Bash(python -c "
import csv
with open(''output_result.csv'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader(f)
    row = next(reader)

yahoo_pc = row.get(''Yahooパソコン'', '''')

count_genryou = yahoo_pc.count(''原材料'')
count_hinmei = yahoo_pc.count(''品名'')
count_naiyou = yahoo_pc.count(''内容量'')

print(''Yahoo パソコン版:'')
print(f''  原材料の出現回数: {count_genryou}回'')
print(f''  品名の出現回数: {count_hinmei}回'')
print(f''  内容量の出現回数: {count_naiyou}回'')

if count_genryou == 1 and count_hinmei == 1 and count_naiyou == 1:
    print(''\n重複削除成功!'')
else:
    print(''\nまだ重複が残っています'')
")

Bash(python -c "
import csv
with open(''output_result.csv'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader(f)
    row = next(reader)

yahoo_pc = row.get(''Yahooパソコン'', '''')

count_genryou = yahoo_pc.count(''原材料'')
count_hinmei = yahoo_pc.count(''品名'')
count_naiyou = yahoo_pc.count(''内容量'')

print(''\n=== 重複チェック結果 ==='')
print(f''原材料の出現回数: {count_genryou}回 (目標: 1回)'')
print(f''品名の出現回数: {count_hinmei}回 (目標: 1回)'')
print(f''内容量の出現回数: {count_naiyou}回 (目標: 1回)'')

if count_genryou == 1 and count_hinmei == 1 and count_naiyou == 1:
    print(''\n✓ 重複削除成功！'')
else:
    print(''\nまだ重複が残っています'')
")
